column6:
It's the end of Chris Yost and Craig Kyle's first year on New X-Men! Saying it's been a tough year is an understatement! But it's not over yet. The students at Xavier's still have Nimrod to deal with. And before this issue is over, another New X-Men will fall!,2006,10
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | penciller (cover):Paco Medina | colorist:Brian Reber | letterer:Dave Sharpe | inker:Juan Vlasco
